snippet: A decision by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to have a boat show’s dates changed provides a glimpse into his decision-making style and its unintended consequences.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo creates a furor in trade show industry after he intervenes in changing dates of New York Boat Show, upsetting the calendar for five other trade shows and conventions scheduled at Jacob K Javits Convention Center in New York.
lead_paragraph: A decision by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to have a boat show’s dates changed provides a glimpse into his decision-making style and its unintended consequences.

headline.main: Industry Is Angered Over Move by Cuomo
headline.print_headline: Industry Is Angered Over Move by Cuomo
